action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image shows a corner of a kitchen with modern appliances. There is a white refrigerator on the right, a white dishwasher below a dark gray countertop in the center, and a white electric range with an over-the-range microwave above it on the left. The kitchen has white cabinetry and light-colored tile flooring. There is a window with blinds in the background.

DESCRIPTION: The image shows a modern kitchen corner with white cabinets and a gray countertop. There is a built-in microwave and oven on the right, both with stainless steel finishes and the oven has a green decorative pattern on the door. The handles on the cabinets are silver and horizontal. On the countertop, there are various kitchen utensils in a holder, and what appears to be a green cutting board. The floor is tiled, and there is a window with blinds above the countertop. Sticky notes are attached to some of the cabinet doors.
